title: add QParser.getSortSpec, deprecate misleadingly named QParser.getSort

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content:
In SOLR-6203 Judith Silverman's patch included addition of getSortSpec as a wrapper around the misleadingly named getSort QParser method.

This patch here is split out and adapted from the SOLR-6203 patch and I propose that the misleadingly named getSort be marked deprecated and that it be implemented as a wrapper around the getSortSpec method.
